scripts.1: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=1 USERNAME=$US_USERNAME PASSWORD=$US_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='US-English'
scripts.2: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=2 USERNAME=$UK_USERNAME PASSWORD=$UK_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='UK-English'
scripts.3: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=3 USERNAME=$DE_USERNAME PASSWORD=$DE_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='Germany'
scripts.4: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=4 USERNAME=$FR_USERNAME PASSWORD=$FR_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='France'
scripts.5: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=5 USERNAME=$JP_USERNAME PASSWORD=$JP_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='Japan'
scripts.6: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=6 USERNAME=$AU_USERNAME PASSWORD=$AU_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='Australia'
scripts.7: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=7 USERNAME=$BR_USERNAME PASSWORD=$BR_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='Brazil'
scripts.8: cross-env RUN_NUMBER=8 USERNAME=$IN_USERNAME PASSWORD=$IN_PASSWORD npx playwright test tests/test.spec.ts --project='India'
